website_summaries.verdict: Weather is an Android app that deftly displays forecasts and current conditions. Its older design and lack of features hold it back, though.
pros: Easily check weekly and hourly forecasts

customer_reviews.title: An essential on my Fire Stick 4K
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install Easy to use Easy to understand As accurate as anything else I've used Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Boogie

customer_reviews.title: I like brilliant graphics and been to see very clearly well done .
customer_reviews.text: For the fist time I used the weather app . I was impressed with the graphics & so clear. I like the up to date weather well done.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best currently available
customer_reviews.text: Good and unlike other weather apps it gives current temperature. Only negative I've found so far is it only gives detailed weather for the next 24 hours and I'd prefer it for the next 2 or 3 days.

customer_reviews.title: Quite dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: After downloading I deleted it straight away, it just shows the current weather without future forecasts, don't see the point in that as I can simply look through the window to find out what the weather's like.
